name: SCNBlendMode
desc: Modes that describe how SceneKit blends source colors rendered using a material with destination colors already in a rendering target, used by the blendMode property.

items.name: case alpha
items.desc: Blend by multiplying source and destination color values by their corresponding alpha values.

items.name: case add
items.desc: Blend by adding the source color to the destination color.

items.name: case subtract
items.desc: Blend by subtracting the source color from the destination color.

items.name: case multiply
items.desc: Blend by multiplying the source color with the background color.

items.name: case screen
items.desc: Blend by multiplying the inverse of the source color with the inverse of the destination color.

items.name: case replace
items.desc: Blend by replacing the destination color with the source color, ignoring alpha.
